targets.query:
from(bucket: "Testing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "Test1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_amazon" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_apple" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_cern" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_cloudflare" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_facebook" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_google" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_instagram" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_microsoft" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_pisapapeles" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_spacex" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_starlink" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_tesla" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_tiktok" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_twitter" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_whatsapp" or r["entity_id"] == "heartbeat_youtube")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "round_trip_time_max")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "units")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "Testing")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "Test1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["entity_id"] == "download_speedtest2_pisapapeleslabs_com" or r["entity_id"] == "download_speedtest_pisapapeleslabs_com" or r["entity_id"] == "fast_com_download" or r["entity_id"] == "speedtest_download")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Mbit/s")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
